entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Rain or drizzle early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
